name: MUSIC FRIEND (fallen sprite)
description:
MUSIC FRIEND (fallen sprite) is a cute drowsy musical toy for Windows, Mac and Linux! Enjoy Fallen Sprite as a desktop pal, or fall asleep to her relaxing tunes...

Comes with 1 Fallen Sprite, 1 Flower, 1 Cupcake, all with CRYPT-PHONIC Audio Feedback

"Officially Endorsed Crypt Product" – Lily Zone, Crypt Worlds

"Yow!" – Porpentine
